overview:
Intranet Connections is out-of-the-box Social Intranet Software. We combine key business tools for process, workflow and improved communication and we merge them with social networking and collaboration tools designed to engage and promote culture within the digital workplace.

Business + Social Collaboration = Powerful All-In-One Intranet Software

-One-stop-service for employees -Streamline business tasks and workflow -Go paperless with online forms, documents and policies -Educate employees and track student registration for training and development -Promote teamwork through social networking, FAQ’s and knowledge-share -Find colleagues quickly based on shared interests and skills -Share with colleagues by posting on their wall or one-on-one chat -Learn by doing with our innovative Tutorial Builder that hand-holds you through tasks -Easy to use because we know without simplicity no one will use your intranet -Simple navigation we subscribe to the 3-click rule: take away the pain. Make it dead simple -Leadership mentoring blogs and facebook-like message walls help to foster mentoring -Social tools for easy collaboration, engagement and the building of culture

To see more details of our intranet features visit http://www.intranetconnections.com/sections/intranet_features.cfm

Improve corporate communicate and culture
Streamline business process and procedure
Automate business workflow
Move documents, paper forms & requests online
Launching point for your internal systems and resources
Connect people with social networking and people search
